description: If you're looking for a fun and unique kombucha cocktail to serve at your next party, this Honey Rose Kombucha Margarita is definitely it! Trust us; your guests will be impressed.This kombucha cocktail is a refreshing and slightly tart twist on the classic margarita. It's made with honey, rose water, tequila, and of course, kombucha! The best part about this drink is that it's relatively low in sugar since kombucha is naturally fermented.
